collections.title: Copywriters and Content Creators Prompts
collections.description: ChatGPT prompts tailored for copywriters and content creators

promptTemplates.title: Blog Post Ideas
promptTemplates.content: Generate three unique blog post ideas for a website focused on {copywriters_content_topic}.

promptTemplates.title: Ad Copy Creation
promptTemplates.content: Create an engaging ad copy for {copywriters_product_name}, emphasizing its key feature: {copywriters_product_feature}.

promptTemplates.title: SEO Article Outline
promptTemplates.content: Provide an outline for an SEO-friendly article about {copywriters_seo_topic}. Include suggested keywords.
